def_cn: 含糊不清的;不明确的;模棱两可的
def_en: If you describe something as ambiguous, you mean that it is unclear or confusing because it can be understood in more than one way.

def_cn: 暧昧不清的；不协调的；捉摸不定的
def_en: If you describe something as ambiguous, you mean that it contains several different ideas or attitudes that do not fit well together.
